metrics.name: Total amount of opportunity expected revenue
metrics.description: Total amount of the expected revenue considering all opportunities

metrics.name: Total amount of opportunity expected revenue lost
metrics.description: Total amount of the expected revenue considering only opportunity lost

metrics.name: Total amount of opportunity expected revenue won
metrics.description: Total amount of the expected revenue considering only opportunity won

metrics.name: Lead Conversion Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of converted lead: ((number of leads converted to opportunities) / (number of leads processed)) X 100

metrics.name: Average opportunity lost time
metrics.description: Average time from creating the opportunity to loosing the opportunity
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${lto_sapsalescloud_opp_lost_events})) 
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${lto_sapsalescloud_opp_created_events}))
)

metrics.name: Average lead response time
metrics.description: Average time from lead creation to working on lead
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE NOT event_name IN (${lto_sapsalescloud_lead_created_events})))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE event_name IN (${lto_sapsalescloud_lead_created_events})))
)

metrics.description: Total number of won opportunities

metrics.name: Opportunities without lead
metrics.description: Total number of opportunities without lead

metrics.description: Total number of currently open opportunities

metrics.description: Number of leads converted with qualification

metrics.name: Win/loss ratio
metrics.description: Ratio of won to lost opportunities. A value > 1 indicates that there are more opportunities won than lost.

metrics.name: Average lead conversion time
metrics.description: Average time from lead creation to lead conversion
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${lto_sapsalescloud_lead_converted_events})) 
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${lto_sapsalescloud_lead_created_events}))
)

metrics.name: Average opportunity win time
metrics.description: Average time from creating the opportunity to winning the opportunity
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${lto_sapsalescloud_opp_won_events})) 
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${lto_sapsalescloud_opp_created_events}))
)

metrics.name: Leads Converted without Qualification
metrics.description: Number of leads converted without qualification
metrics.signalFragment:
count(case_id)
filter(WHERE event_name MATCHES(${lto_sapsalescloud_lead_converted_events}))
-
count(case_id)
filter(WHERE event_name MATCHES(${lto_sapsalescloud_lead_convert_qualified_events}))

metrics.description: Total number of qualified leads

metrics.description: Total of leads converted

metrics.name: No-touch Opportunity
metrics.description: Percentage of opportunities without interactions
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT ("case_id") FILTER (
	WHERE ${lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_tasks} = 0
      AND ${lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_appointments} = 0
      AND ${lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_emails} = 0
      AND ${lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_phone_calls} = 0
      AND ${lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_visits} = 0
      )

metrics.description: Percentage of won to all the opportunities in the sales cloud system

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_close_opp_events
variables.description: Events indicating that an opportunity was closed, for example 'Opportunity: Won'

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_opportunity_expected_revenue
variables.description: Attribute that identifies a the expected revenue of the opportunity, for example "Opportunity Expected Revenue Amount"

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_lead_identifier
variables.description: Attribute that identifies a lead, for example "Is Lead"

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_lead_created_events
variables.description: Events indicating that a lead was created, for example 'Lead: Open'

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_lead_converted_events
variables.description: Events that indicating that a lead was converted, for example 'Lead: Converted'

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_lead_qualified_events
variables.description: Events that indicating that a lead was qualified, for example 'Lead: Qualified'

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_lead_declined_events
variables.description: Events that indicating that a lead was declined or rejected, for example 'Lead: Declined'

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_opp_created_events

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_opp_won_events
variables.description: Events indicating that a opportunity was won, for example 'Opportunity: Won'

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_opp_lost_events

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_opp_won_condition

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_tasks

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_appointments
variables.description: Attribute that identifies the number of appointments created for a specific opportunity , for example "Number of Appointments"

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_emails
variables.description: Attribute that identifies the number of e-mail sent to a customer for a specific opportunity , for example "Number of E-mails"

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_phone_calls
variables.description: Attribute that identifies the number of phone calls made to a customer for a specific opportunity , for example "Number of Phones"

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_visits
variables.description: Attribute that identifies the number of visits made to a customer for a specific opportunity , for example "Number of Visits"

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_employee_changes
variables.description: Attribute that identifies the number of employee changes for a specific opportunity , for example "Number of Employees Change"

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_attr_number_contacted_people
variables.description: Attribute that identifies the number of contacted people related a specific opportunity , for example "Number of Contacts"

variables.name: lto_sapsalescloud_lead_convert_qualified_events
variables.description: Condition that indicating that a case was converted after being qualified, for example 'Lead: Qualified' ~> 'Lead: Converted'
